alert.note: Alert for Middle Kuskokwim Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 01 at 3:40PM AKDT until July 02 at 1:00AM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM AKDT SATURDAY FOR HOT DRY AND WINDY CONDITIONS FOR THE MIDDLE KUSKOKWIM VALLEY FROM STONY RIVER EAST AND FROM LIME VILLAGE NORTH... * Winds...South 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph over higher terrain. * Timing...Hot, dry, and windy conditions are expected this afternoon and evening. * Relative Humidity...As low as 25 percent. * Temperatures...65 to 75 degrees. * Location...Middle Kuskokwim Valley from Stony River east and from Lime Village north. * Impacts...Rapid ignition, growth, and spread of fires will be possible.
info.instruction: A red flag warning means that critical fire weather conditions are imminent or occurring now, or will shortly. It is directed toward fire agencies, and through them to the public.
